TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SecurityRulesAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class SecurityRulesAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class SecurityRulesAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指示公共语言运行时应该对程序集强制的一组安全规则。

span.span: Indicates the set of security rules the common language runtime should enforce for an assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类表示的公共语言运行时应为程序集强制实施的安全规则集。This class indicates which set of security rules the common language runtime should enforce for an assembly. 例如，将标有程序集`[SecurityRules(SecurityRuleSet.Level1)]`使用.NET Framework 版本 2.0 透明度规则，其中公共安全关键类型和成员处理为安全-可靠-关键的程序集外部。For example, an assembly that is marked with `[SecurityRules(SecurityRuleSet.Level1)]` uses the .NET Framework version 2.0 transparency rules, where public security-critical types and members are treated as security-safe-critical outside the assembly. 这要求安全关键类型和成员执行链接要求完全信任的外部调用方访问它们时强制执行安全关键的行为。This requires security-critical types and members to perform a link demand for full trust to enforce security-critical behavior when they are accessed by external callers. 通常情况下，级别 1 的规则应仅为兼容性，例如针对 2.0 版程序集。Typically, level 1 rules should be used only for compatibility, such as for version 2.0 assemblies. 级别 1 行为的详细信息，请参阅[安全透明的代码，级别 1](~/docs/framework/misc/security-transparent-code-level-1.md)。For more information about level 1 behavior, see [Security-Transparent Code, Level 1](~/docs/framework/misc/security-transparent-code-level-1.md). 有关第 2 级行为的信息，请参阅[安全透明的代码，级别 2](~/docs/framework/misc/security-transparent-code-level-2.md)。For information about level 2 behavior, see [Security-Transparent Code, Level 2](~/docs/framework/misc/security-transparent-code-level-2.md).

related.span: .NET Framework 4.0 版中的安全性更改

span.span: Security Changes in the .NET Framework Version 4.0

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies the transparency rules set.

summary.span: 使用指定的规则集值初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified rule set value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当指定`ruleSet`参数，请使用.NET Framework 2.0 版规则或为[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]规则。When you specify the `ruleSet` parameter, use for .NET Framework version 2.0 rules or for [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] rules. 有关详细信息行为，请参阅[安全透明的代码，级别 1](~/docs/framework/misc/security-transparent-code-level-1.md)。For more information about behavior, see [Security-Transparent Code, Level 1](~/docs/framework/misc/security-transparent-code-level-1.md). 璝惠行为，请参阅[安全透明的代码，级别 2](~/docs/framework/misc/security-transparent-code-level-2.md)。For information about behavior, see [Security-Transparent Code, Level 2](~/docs/framework/misc/security-transparent-code-level-2.md).

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies the transparency rules to be applied.

summary.span: 确定完全信任的透明代码是否应该跳过 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 验证。

span.span: Determines whether fully trusted transparent code should skip Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) verification.

value.span: 如果应该跳过 MSIL 验证，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if MSIL verification should be skipped; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性应仅用于优化，因为不能强制实施透明代码进行的安全保证，如果代码是不可验证的。This property should be used only for optimization, because security guarantees made for transparent code cannot be enforced if the code is unverifiable. 如果此属性用于跳过 MSIL 验证的程序集，使用`transparent`选项中以静态方式验证程序集的透明代码是否满足类型安全要求。If you use this property to skip MSIL verification for an assembly, use the `transparent` option in the to statically verify that the assembly's transparent code meets type safety requirements.
